trans-unit.source: Provides a method that when implemented, resolves a latitude/longitude location to a civic address.

To resolve a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> to a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> asynchronously, implement <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>, and provide the civic address data to the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Per risolvere un <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> per un <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> in modo asincrono, implementare <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>e fornire i dati civico il <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> evento.

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
Resolves a <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to a civic address synchronously.
The following example shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
Initiates a request to resolve a latitude/longitude location to an address.
The following example shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an asynchronous request using <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" /> to resolve a latitude/longitude to a civic address is complete.

The following example demonstrates how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> and handle the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come chiamare <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> e gestire il <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> evento.
